verses.text: “\w Say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, ‘\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!’\f + \fr 2:1 \ft ‘Ammi’ in Hebrew\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* sisters, ‘\w My|strong="H1961"\w* loved \w one|strong="H3808"\w*!’\f + \fr 2:1 \ft ‘Ruhamah’ in Hebrew\f*

Contend \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* mother! Contend, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wife, \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* husband; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* prostitution \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* face, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* adulteries \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w between|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* breasts;

lest \w I|strong="H5971"\w* strip her naked, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* make her bare \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* day \w that|strong="H5971"\w* she \w was|strong="H5971"\w* born, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* make her \w like|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* set her \w like|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dry land, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* kill her \w with|strong="H5971"\w* thirst.

\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w* children \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mercy, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H6440"\w* unfaithfulness.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* mother \w has|strong="H3117"\w* played \w the|strong="H3205"\w* prostitute. She \w who|strong="H3205"\w* conceived \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w* shamefully; \w for|strong="H3117"\w* she said, ‘\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* go \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* lovers, \w who|strong="H3205"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* bread \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* water, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wool \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* flax, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* oil \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* drink.’

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w*,\f + \fr 2:6 \ft “Behold”, from “\+wh הִנֵּה\+wh*”, means look at, take notice, observe, see, or gaze at. It is often used as an interjection.\f* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hedge \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* way \w with|strong="H1121"\w* thorns, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall against \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w*’t \w find|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* way.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* won’t overtake \w them|strong="H5414"\w*; \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* seek \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* won’t \w find|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* say, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* return \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* first husband, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* better \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*.’

\w For|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H3651"\w* didn’t know \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* gave \w her|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* grain, \w the|strong="H1870"\w* new wine, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* multiplied \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H4672"\w* silver \w and|strong="H1870"\w* gold, which \w they|strong="H3651"\w* used \w for|strong="H3651"\w* Baal.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* grain \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* new wine \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* season, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* pluck \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wool \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* flax \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* covered \w her|strong="H4672"\w* nakedness.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* uncover \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lewdness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sight \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w also|strong="H6256"\w* \w cause|strong="H3651"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* celebrations \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w cease|strong="H7725"\w*: \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* moons, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* Sabbaths, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w solemn|strong="H4150"\w* \w assemblies|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w lay|strong="H1540"\w* waste \w her|strong="H1540"\w* vines \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* fig trees, \w about|strong="H3027"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* said, ‘These \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* wages \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* lovers \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w*,’ \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* animals \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* field \w shall|strong="H5869"\w* eat \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H7673"\w* visit \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H2282"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Baals, \w to|strong="H4150"\w* \w which|strong="H2282"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* burned incense when \w she|strong="H2320"\w* decked herself \w with|strong="H4150"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* earrings \w and|strong="H4150"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* jewels, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* went after \w her|strong="H3605"\w* lovers \w and|strong="H4150"\w* forgot \w me|strong="H3605"\w*,” says \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

“Therefore behold, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* allure \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* speak tenderly \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w her|strong="H5921"\w* vineyards \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Achor \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* door \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hope; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* respond \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* youth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* day,” \w says|strong="H1696"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* ‘\w my|strong="H5921"\w* husband,’ \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w no|strong="H1696"\w* longer call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* ‘\w my|strong="H5921"\w* master.’

\w For|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w take|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* names \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Baals \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* longer \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w mentioned|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* name.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w animals|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* field, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* birds \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sky, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* creeping \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* ground. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* bow, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w battle|strong="H3117"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* safely.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* betroth \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w me|strong="H5493"\w* forever. Yes, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* betroth \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w me|strong="H5493"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* righteousness, \w in|strong="H5493"\w* justice, \w in|strong="H5493"\w* loving kindness, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* compassion.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* even betroth \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* faithfulness; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* know \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w It|strong="H4941"\w* \w will|strong="H6664"\w* happen \w in|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H5769"\w* day, \w that|strong="H5769"\w* I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* respond,” says \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. “I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* respond \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* they \w will|strong="H6664"\w* respond \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* earth;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* respond \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* new wine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* oil; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* respond \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Jezreel.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sow \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* obtained \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H6030"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w*;’ \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, ‘\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*!’”
